text: Awon rakunmi, A se won ninu awon nnkan arisami fun esin Allahu fun yin. Oore wa lara won fun yin. Nitori naa, e daruko Allahu le won lori (ki e si gun won) ni iduro. Nigba ti won ba fi egbe lele, e je ninu re. E fi bo oniteelorun ati atoroje. Bayen ni A se ro won fun yin nitori ki e le dupe (fun Un)
